result.title: Codeforces' official page on Facebook?
result.content:
Hi there, Maybe two years ago I created THIS page on facebook. Now I am ready to give it away to someone else who can post and update it regularly. Perhaps one can say that codeforces on facebook is less important, but it would be great to see that when it is more active on facebook as well. If you are interested in please message me.

-Thank you. -Baskape.
